import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import './index.css' export default class info_class extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { classDetail: '' } } componentDidMount() { axios.get('http://localhost:3000/classes') .then( (response) => { const {id} = this.props.match.params const classDetail = response.data.find((c) => c.id === id*1)//返回第一个结果为true this.setState({classDetail}) }) } render () { return(
我的班级
返回上一级
折纸兴趣班

  • 所有学生{}
  • 所有家长{}
) } }
